source.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
       A.MATNR AS CD_PRODUCTO,
       UPPER(A.MAKTX) AS NOMBRE_PRODUCTO, 
       CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.PRDHA,2,2), '-') , SUBSTR(B.PRDHA,4,2)), '-'), SUBSTR(B.PRDHA,6,3)), '-'), SUBSTR(B.PRDHA,9,3)) AS CD_MARCA_PROD, 
	   LPAD(B.BISMT,18,'0') AS CD_PRODUCTO_EQV,
	   D.FACTOR_LITROS,
	   D.FACTOR_LIBRAS,
	   D.FACTOR_CAJAS, 
	   D.FACTOR_PALETAS,
	   CASE
	   WHEN SUBSTR(B.PRDHA,4,2) IN('03', '04', '70', '80', '85')
		THEN 'LB'
		ELSE 'L'
	END AS UND_MED
FROM "SAPHANADB"."MAKT" A 
	JOIN "SAPHANADB"."MARA" B ON
		B.MATNR = A.MATNR AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT
	LEFT JOIN (SELECT MATNR, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'L'  THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_LITROS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'LB' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_LIBRAS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'CS' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_CAJAS, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN MEINH = 'PAL' THEN UMREN/UMREZ ELSE 0 END) AS FACTOR_PALETAS 
				FROM "SAPHANADB"."MARM" A 
				WHERE A.MANDT='400'  AND MEINH IN('L', 'CS', 'PAL', 'LB') 
				GROUP BY MATNR
				ORDER BY MATNR
		   ) D ON
		D.MATNR = A.MATNR  
WHERE A.MANDT='400'   AND SPRAS = 'S' AND B.PRDHA <> ''
ORDER BY A.MATNR

SELECT DISTINCT
	BLAND AS CD_PROVINICIA,
	UPPER(BEZEI) AS NOM_PROVINCIA
FROM "SAPHANADB"."T005U" 
WHERE MANDT='400' AND LAND1 = 'DO'
ORDER BY BLAND

SELECT A.KVGR2 AS CD_REGION_VENTA
	,UPPER(A.BEZEI) AS NOM_REGION_VENTA

FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVV2T" A
WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.SPRAS = 'S'

SELECT DISTINCT
	A.VKORG AS CD_ORGANIZACION,
	A.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO,
	A.VKGRP AS CD_ZONA,
	A.ZTP_RUTA AS TIPO_RUTA,
	A.BZIRK AS CD_RUTA,
	Max(COALESCE(B.LTEXT, CONCAT('RUTA ',A.BZIRK))) AS NOM_RUTA,
	Min(B.ROUTE_ECC) AS CD_RUTA_ANTERIOR, 
	GERENCIA,
	KUNNR_SUP AS CD_SUPERVISOR
FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA" A
	  LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZPB_CONV_ROUTE"  B ON
		B.ROUTE = A.BZIRK AND
		B.WERKS = A.WERKS AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT
WHERE A.MANDT='400' and A.VKORG in ( 'DO10' , 'DO11') 
group by 
	A.VKORG,
	A.WERKS,
	A.VKGRP,
	A.ZTP_RUTA,
	A.BZIRK,
	GERENCIA,
	KUNNR_SUP
ORDER BY A.BZIRK, A.VKORG, A.WERKS, A.VKGRP, A.ZTP_RUTA, A.BZIRK

SELECT 
	A.MVGR2 AS COD_TEC_PROD,
    UPPER(A.BEZEI) AS NOM_TEC_PROD
FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVM2T"  A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S'  
ORDER BY A.MVGR2

SELECT 
			IND_SECTOR AS CD_TIPO_CLIENTE,
			TEXT AS NM_TIPO_CLIENTE
		 FROM SAPHANADB.TB038B 
		 WHERE CLIENT = '400' AND SPRAS = 'S'
			   AND IND_SECTOR LIKE 'Z%' AND LENGTH(TEXT) > 1
			   AND ISTYPE = '0001'
		 ORDER BY IND_SECTOR

SELECT DISTINCT
		 SUBSTR(A.PRODH,2,11) AS COD_TP_PROD,
		 UPPER(A.VTEXT) AS NOM_TP_PROD
	FROM "SAPHANADB"."T179T" A
	WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S' AND LENGTH(SUBSTR(A.PRODH,2,11)) = 2 AND LEFT(A.PRODH,1) = 'M'
	ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PRODH,2,11)

SELECT 
	A.VKGRP AS CD_ZONA,
	UPPER(A.BEZEI) AS NOM_ZONA
FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVGRT" A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S' 
ORDER BY A.VKGRP

query.value:
SELECT 
	A.ERDAT AS FECHA_DESPACHO,
	LEFT(A.ERDAT,6) AS CD_PERIODO_DESPACHO,   
    min(C.VBELV) AS CD_ORDEN_VENTAS,
	A.VBELN AS CD_DESPACHO_VENTA,
	B.POSNR AS POS_NUM,
	A.VKORG AS CD_ORG,
	E.VKGRP AS CD_ZONA,
	E.GERENCIA AS CD_GERENCIA_VENTA,
	E.RUTA AS CD_RUTA,
	A.KUNNR AS CD_CLIENTE,
	A.WAERK AS CD_MONEDA,
	B.MATNR AS PRODUCTO,
    B.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO_DISTRIBICION,
	0.00 AS MONTO_BONIFICACION,
	0.00 AS NETWR,
	B.VTWEG AS CD_CANAL_DISTRIBUCION,
	B.LGMNG AS CANT_ITEMS,  
	0.00 AS MONTO_NETO,
	0.00 AS TOTAL_IMPUESTO,
	0.00 AS TOTAL_DESC_ORG,
	E.CONVERSION_MONEDA AS TASA_REF_MON,
	D.KUNNR_SUP AS CD_VENDEDOR_SUP,
	A.spe_loekz AS INDICADOR_BORRADO 
 FROM SAPHANADB.LIKP A 
	LEFT JOIN  SAPHANADB.LIPS  B ON
			B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
			B.VBELN = A.VBELN  
	LEFT JOIN  SAPHANADB.VBFA  C ON
			B.VBELN = C.VBELN AND
			B.POSNR = C.POSNN
	LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.VGBEL, E.GERENCIA, E.FACT_ANULADA, E.RUTA, E.ORGANIZACION, 
					  E.VKGRP, AVG(E.CONVERSION_MONEDA) as CONVERSION_MONEDA 
				FROM SAPHANADB.ZCDS_SD_INVOICE E 
				GROUP BY E.VGBEL, E.GERENCIA, E.FACT_ANULADA, E.RUTA, E.ORGANIZACION, E.VKGRP ) E ON
			B.VBELN = E.VGBEL 
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA D ON
			D.BZIRK = A.ROUTE AND
			D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
			D.VKORG = A.VKORG 	
WHERE A.MANDT = '400' AND A.ERDAT BETWEEN  @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')}
		and C.VBTYP_N = 'J' AND E.FACT_ANULADA <> 'X'   
group by A.ERDAT , LEFT(A.ERDAT,6) , A.VBELN ,B.POSNR ,A.VKORG ,E.VKGRP ,
	E.GERENCIA,E.RUTA ,A.KUNNR ,A.WAERK ,B.MATNR ,B.WERKS ,B.VTWEG ,
	B.LGMNG ,  E.CONVERSION_MONEDA ,D.KUNNR_SUP, A.spe_loekz 
ORDER BY B.MATNR , B.WERKS ,LEFT(A.ERDAT,6)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [NM_ENTIDAD]
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_INI_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT) as FECHA_INICIAL
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_FIN_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT)  as FECHA_FINAL
      ,cast(FORMAT(DATEADD(MM,-1, FC_INI_CARGA) ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT) as FECHA_INICIAL_COSTO
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_FIN_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT)  as FECHA_FINAL_COSTO
FROM [dbo].[MD_CONTROL]
WHERE NM_ENTIDAD = 'STG_FACT_DESPACHO_VENTA'

query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 
       A.matnr AS material,
      A.bwkey AS centro,
       CONCAT(A.lfgja, A.lfmon) AS periodo,
       A.vprsv AS control,
       CASE A.vprsv
         WHEN 'V' THEN A.verpr / A.peinh
         WHEN 'S' THEN A.stprs / A.peinh
       END   AS costo
	   ,C.TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM   SAPHANADB.mbewh A
LEFT JOIN (

  SELECT 
    B.CD_PERIODO,
	C.TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM 
  ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(LEFT(B.ANIO,4), RIGHT(B.MES,2)) as CD_PERIODO  from
SAPHANADB.ZCDS_COSTOS B where RIGHT(B.MES,2) < '13') B left join 
(
  SELECT  A.CD_PERIODO,
	LEAD(A.CD_PERIODO,1,'299901') over (ORDER BY A.CD_PERIODO) AS CD_PERIODO_FIN,
	A.TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM ( 
  SELECT 
	LEFT(cast((99999999 - GDATU) as varchar(8)),6)  AS CD_PERIODO,
	AVG(UKURS) AS TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM SAPHANADB.TCURR A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400'  AND FCURR = 'USD'
GROUP BY FCURR, TCURR, LEFT(cast((99999999 - GDATU) as varchar(8)),6) ) A ) C

on B.CD_PERIODO >= C.CD_PERIODO AND B.CD_PERIODO < C.CD_PERIODO_FIN


) C on C.CD_PERIODO =  CONCAT(A.lfgja, A.lfmon) 

WHERE  CONCAT(A.lfgja, A.lfmon) BETWEEN LEFT('@{variables('Fecha_Ini_Costo')}',6)  AND LEFT('@{variables('Fecha_Fin_Costo')}',6) 
ORDER BY A.matnr, A.bwkey, CONCAT(A.lfgja, A.lfmon)

SELECT DISTINCT
	A.VBELN AS CD_ORDEN_VENTA,
	A.POSNR AS CD_ORDEN_VENTA_DETALLE,
	B.ERDAT AS FECHA_ORDEN_VENTA,
	B.VDATU AS FECHA_ENTREGA,	
	A.VKORG_ANA AS CD_ORG,
	CASE WHEN E.AUBEL IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.BZIRK_ANA) = 0 then G.GERENCIA else F.GERENCIA end else E.GERENCIA end AS CD_GERENCIA_VENTA,
	CASE WHEN E.AUBEL IS NULL THEN A.VKGRP_ANA else E.VKGRP END AS CD_ZONA,
	CASE WHEN E.AUBEL IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.BZIRK_ANA) = 0 then G.BZIRK else F.BZIRK end else E.RUTA end AS CD_RUTA,
	A.VTWEG_ANA AS CD_CANAL_DIST,
	A.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO_DISTRIB,
	B.KUNNR AS CD_CLIENTE,
	A.WAERK AS CD_MONEDA,
	A.STCUR AS MONTO_TASA_CAMBIARIA,
	A.MATNR AS CD_PRODUCTO,
	A.NETPR AS PRECIO_UNIT,
	A.KWMENG AS CANT_ITEMS,
	A.VOLUM AS VOLUMEN,
	0 AS DESCUENTO,
	0 AS MONTO_BONIFICACION,	
	A.MWSBP AS ITBIS,
	A.NETWR AS MONTO_NETO,
	CASE WHEN E.AUBEL IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.BZIRK_ANA) = 0 then G.KUNNR_SUP else F.KUNNR_SUP end else C.KUNNR_SUP end AS CD_VENDEDOR_SUP,
	D.LADGR, 
	A.AUART_ANA, 
	ABSTK, 
	B.AUART,
	J.MTART,
    H.PARVW	
FROM  SAPHANADB.VBAP A
	INNER JOIN SAPHANADB.VBAK B ON 
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND 
		B.VBELN = A.VBELN 
	LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.AUBEL, E.GERENCIA, E.FACT_ANULADA, E.RUTA, E.ORGANIZACION, E.VKGRP, AVG(E.CONVERSION_MONEDA) as CONVERSION_MONEDA FROM SAPHANADB.ZCDS_SD_INVOICE E 
				GROUP BY E.AUBEL, E.GERENCIA, E.FACT_ANULADA, E.RUTA, E.ORGANIZACION, E.VKGRP ) E ON
		B.VBELN = E.AUBEL 
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA C ON
		C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		C.VKORG = A.VKORG_ANA AND
		C.BZIRK = E.RUTA 	    
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA F ON
		F.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		F.VKORG = A.VKORG_ANA AND
		F.BZIRK = A.BZIRK_ANA 		
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA G ON	
		G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		G.VKORG = A.VKORG_ANA AND
		G.BZIRK = A.ROUTE 	
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.MARC D ON
		D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		D.WERKS = A.WERKS AND
		D.MATNR = A.MATNR	  
	LEFT JOIN (SELECT MANDT, VBELN, PARVW FROM SAPHANADB.VBPA WHERE vbpa.parvw = 'WE') H ON 
		H.MANDT = B.MANDT AND
		H.VBELN = B.VBELN
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.MARA J ON 
		J.MATNR = A.MATNR AND 
		J.MANDT = A.MANDT
WHERE 
	A.MANDT = '400'  AND 
	LENGTH(A.MATNR) > 0 AND 
	A.KUNNR_ANA <> A.ROUTE AND 
 (( B.ERDAT BETWEEN @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')})  or ( B.VDATU BETWEEN @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')}))

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [NM_ENTIDAD]
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_INI_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT) as FECHA_INICIAL
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_FIN_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT)  as FECHA_FINAL
FROM [dbo].[MD_CONTROL]
WHERE NM_ENTIDAD = 'STG_FACT_ORDEN_VENTA'

query.value:
SELECT
	A.ID_DOC AS CD_SUGERIDO_VENTA,
	B.POS AS CD_SUGERIDO_DETALLE_VENTA, 
	A.FECHA_DOC AS FECHA_SUGERIDO_VENTA,
	A.BUKRS AS CD_ORGANIZACION,
	A.WERKS AS CD_CENTRO_DISTRIBUCION,
	A.ROTCODE AS CD_RUTA,
	A.ID_VENDEDOR AS CD_VENDEDOR,
	A.MONEDA AS MONEDA,
	B.ID_MATERIAL AS CD_PRODUCTO,
	B.CANTIDAD_MODIFICADA AS CANTIDAD_ITEMS,
	B.MONTO_PRECIO AS PRECIO_UNITARIO,
	B.MONTO_SUBTOTAL AS MONTO_BRUTO,
	B.MONTO_DESCUENTO AS DESCUENTO,
	B.MONTO_ITBIS AS ITBIS,
	B.MONTO_TOTAL AS MONTO_NETO,
	C.VTWEG AS CD_CANAL,
	C.KUNNR_SUP AS CD_VENDEDOR_SUP,
	C.VKGRP AS CD_ZONA_VENTA
FROM  SAPHANADB.ZSD_LIQ_INF_FA_K A
	  JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSD_LIQ_INF_FA_P B ON
		  B.ID_DOC = A.ID_DOC AND
		  B.MANDT  = A.MANDT
	  JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA C ON
		  C.BZIRK = A.ROTCODE AND
		  C.MANDT  = A.MANDT AND
	  C.VKORG = A.BUKRS	  
WHERE A.MANDT='400' AND A.FECHA_DOC BETWEEN @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')}
ORDER BY A.FECHA_DOC, A.ID_DOC, B.POS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [NM_ENTIDAD]
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_INI_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT) as FECHA_INICIAL
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_FIN_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT)  as FECHA_FINAL
FROM [dbo].[MD_CONTROL]
WHERE NM_ENTIDAD = 'STG_FACT_SUGERIDO_VENTA_RANCHERA'

query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
	A.NO_FACTURA AS CD_FACT,
	B.VBELN AS CD_DESPACHO,
	A.FECHA AS FECHA_VENTA,
	A.AUBEL AS ORDEN_VENTAS,
	A.POSNR AS CD_DETALLE_FACTURA,
	A.LITROS AS VOLUMEN,
	A.CLIENTE AS CLIENTE,
	A.ORGANIZACION AS ORGANIZACION,
	A.GERENCIA AS CD_GERENCIA_VENTA,
	A.VKGRP AS ZONA,
	CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.RUTA)=0 
		 THEN A.RUTA_ENTREGA 
		 ELSE A.RUTA 
	 END AS RUTA,
	C.EMP_RESP AS CD_VENDEDOR,
	C.EMP_ASIST AS CD_ASISTENTE,
	A.CANAL AS CD_CANAL,
	A.RAMO AS CD_TIPO_CLIENTE,
	A.REGION AS CD_REGION_VENTAS,
	A.MONEDA,
	A.CENTRO,
	A.CONVERSION_MONEDA AS MONTO_TASA_CAMBIARIA,
	MATERIAL AS PRODUCTO,
	A.UNIDADES AS CANTIDAD_ITEMS,
	A.DESCUENTO AS DESCUENTO,
	A.NETWR,
	A.ITBIS AS ITBIS,
	A.PESOS AS MONTO_NETO,
	A.VALOR_BRUTO AS MONTO_BRUTO,
	COSTO_BONIFIC AS MONTO_BONIFICACION,
	D.KUNNR_SUP AS CD_VENDEDOR_SUP, 	
	A.VGBEL as VGBEL,  
	A.MTART, 
	A.CLASE_FACTURA,  
	H.PARVW,
    G.AUART	
FROM SAPHANADB.ZCDS_SD_INVOICE A
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.LIPS B ON 
		B.VBELN = A.VGBEL AND
		B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		B.MATNR = A.MATERIAL
	LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSD_LIQ_INF_GRAL C  ON
		C.ROUTE = A.RUTA AND
		C.MANDT = A.MANDT  AND
		C.FECH_LIQ = A.FECHA	
    LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA D ON
		  D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND
		  D.VKORG = A.ORGANIZACION	 AND
		  D.BZIRK = CASE WHEN LENGTH(RUTA)=0 THEN RUTA_ENTREGA ELSE RUTA END		
    LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.VBAK G on
		G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND 
		G.VBELN = A.AUBEL 
    LEFT JOIN (SELECT MANDT, VBELN, PARVW from SAPHANADB.VBPA WHERE PARVW = 'WE') H ON 
	     A.AUBEL = H.VBELN AND
		 A.MANDT = H.MANDT 
    WHERE A.MANDT='400' AND A.FACT_ANULADA <> 'X' 
	  AND A.UEPOS  = '000000' AND  A.FECHA BETWEEN  @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [NM_ENTIDAD]
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_INI_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT) as FECHA_INICIAL
      ,cast(FORMAT([FC_FIN_CARGA] ,'yyyyMMdd') as INT)  as FECHA_FINAL
FROM [dbo].[MD_CONTROL]
WHERE NM_ENTIDAD = 'STG_FACT_VENTA'

query.value:
SELECT  a.id_gestion AS CD_FACTURA, 
    b.liqlote         AS CD_FACTURA_DETALLE,
    c.route           AS CD_RUTA,
    b.matnr           AS CD_PRODUCTO, 
    b.liqtipo         AS CD_TIPO_DOC,
    b.liqcantidad     AS CANTIDAD_LIQ,
    a.liqfecha_i      AS FECHA_LIQ,
    a.werks           AS CENTRO
  FROM SAPHANADB.zsd_liqprod_cab AS a
  INNER JOIN SAPHANADB.zsd_liqprod_desg AS b ON 
		b.idrecepcion = a.idrecepcion
  INNER JOIN SAPHANADB.zsd_liq_inf_gral AS c ON 
		c.id_gest_liq = a.id_gestion
        AND a.werks = c.werks
  INNER JOIN SAPHANADB.zsd_liqprod_prod AS d ON 
		d.id_gestion = a.id_gestion
        AND d.werks = a.werks
        AND d.matnr = b.matnr
 WHERE b.liqtipo IN('RET', 'AVE', 'DEC') 
    AND a.liqfecha_i BETWEEN @{variables('Fecha_Ini')}  AND @{variables('Fecha_Fin')} 
ORDER BY a.liqfecha_i, c.route,  a.id_gestion, b.liqlote, b.matnr

source.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
	B.KUNNR AS CD_CLIENTE,
	A.NAME AS ACUERDO,
	A.HIGH AS META_ACUERDO
 FROM "SAPHANADB"."TVARVC" A
	  JOIN "SAPHANADB"."KNA1" B ON
		LPAD(A.LOW, 10, '0') = B.KUNNR
 WHERE A.MANDT='400'  AND
		A.NAME IN ('ZSD_ORDERVSBILL_META_YOGURT','ZSD_ORDERVSBILL_META_UHT','ZSD_ORDERVSBILL_META_FRIOS') 
 ORDER BY B.KUNNR

SELECT	
            A.KUNNR AS CD_CLIENTE,
            B.VKORG AS CD_ORGANIZACION,
            B.VWERK AS CD_CENTRO_DIST,
            C.IND_SECTOR AS CD_TIPO_CLIENTE,
            B.VTWEG AS CD_CANAL,
            B.KVGR2 as CD_REGION_VENTA
 FROM "SAPHANADB"."KNA1" A
              LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."KNVV" B ON 
                                 B.KUNNR = A.KUNNR AND
                                 B.MANDT = A.MANDT
			LEFT JOIN SAPHANADB.BUT0IS C ON
					C.CLIENT = A.MANDT AND
					C.PARTNER = A.KUNNR AND 
                                                                                C.ISTYPE = 'R001'  					 
WHERE A.MANDT='400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S'
              AND A.LOEVM <> 'X'
              AND A.KTOKD IN('BPLO','BPIN', 'ZDST', 'ZCPD', 'ZGOB','ZE', 'ZITC')
		
ORDER BY A.KUNNR

SELECT DISTINCT
	KUNNR AS COD_CLIENTE,
	CONDUCTOR1 AS COD_VENDEDOR,
	CONDUCTOR2 AS COD_ASISTENTE
 FROM "SAPHANADB"."KNA1" A
	  LEFT JOIN "SAPHANADB"."ZSD_LIQ_INF_TRA" B ON
		A.KUNNR = B.NUM_DOC
 WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.SPRAS= 'S'
		AND A.LOEVM <> 'X' 
              AND A.KTOKD IN('BPLO','BPIN', 'ZDST', 'ZCPD', 'ZGOB','ZE', 'ZITC')
 ORDER BY A.KUNNR

SELECT 
    CONCAT(LEFT(A.ANIO,4), RIGHT(A.MES,2)) AS PERIODO,
    A.ORGANIZACION,
    A.CENTRO_COSTOS,
    A.CENTRO_BENEFICIO,
    A.MATERIAL,
    sum(A.DIF_INV) as DIF_INV,
    sum(A.COSTO_PROD) as COSTO_PROD,
    sum(A.OTROS_CV) as OTROS_CV,
    sum(A.DECO_INT) as DECO_INT,
    sum(A.DECO_EXTERNO) as DECO_EXTERNO,
    sum(A.PUBLICIDAD) as PUBLICIDAD,
    sum(A.DESCUENT) as DESCUENT,
    sum(A.VENTAS) as VENTAS
FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZCDS_COSTOS" A
WHERE A.MANDT='400'
group by 
    CONCAT(LEFT(A.ANIO,4), RIGHT(A.MES,2)),
    A.ORGANIZACION,
    A.CENTRO_COSTOS,
    A.CENTRO_BENEFICIO,
    A.MATERIAL

SELECT 
bzirk as ruta,	
vkbur as centro,	
periodo as periodo,	
sum(valor) volumen_cuota
FROM "SAPHANADB"."ZTCUOTASTD"
WHERE MANDT='400'
GROUP BY bzirk, vkbur, periodo

SELECT 
	KUNNR AS CD_CLIENTE,
	UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(STRAS,', '), ORT01), ', '), ORT02)) AS DIRECCION,
	REGIO AS CD_PROV,
	LAND1 AS CD_PAIS
FROM "SAPHANADB"."KNA1" A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400' AND A.LOEVM <> 'X'
	   and A.KTOKD IN('BPLO','BPIN', 'ZDST', 'ZCPD', 'ZGOB','ZE', 'ZITC') 
ORDER BY LAND1, REGIO, KUNNR

SELECT
   CONCAT(LEFT(A.GJAHR,4), RIGHT(A.POPER,2)) AS PERIODO,
   A.RBUKRS AS ORGANIZACION,
   A.PRCTR AS CENTRO_BENEFICIO,
   A.MATNR AS MATERIAL,
   A.WERKS AS CENTRO,
sum(A.GASTOS_MERCADEO) as GASTOS_MERCADEO,
SUM(A.GASTOS_ADMINISTRATIVOS) AS GASTOS_ADMINISTRATIVOS,
SUM(A.GASTOS_DISTRIBUCION) AS GASTOS_DISTRIBUCION,
SUM(A.GASTOS_DISTRIBUCION_ALIADOS) AS GASTOS_DISTRIBUCION_ALIADOS,
SUM(A.GASTOS_VENTAS) AS GASTOS_VENTAS
FROM "SAPHANADB".ZCDS_GASTOS A
WHERE A.MANDT='400'
group by
   CONCAT(LEFT(A.GJAHR,4), RIGHT(A.POPER,2)),
   A.RBUKRS,
   A.PRCTR,
   A.MATNR,
   A.WERKS

SELECT 
    A.RUTA,
    A.MATNR AS PRODUCTO,
    A.VKORG AS ORGANIZACION,
    A.PERIODO,
       B.GERENCIA,
    A.PRESUP_UND AS  CANTIDAD_ITEMS_PRESUPUESTO,
    A.PRESUP_PES AS MONTO_NETO_DE_VENTA_PRESUPUESTO,
    A.VTWEG AS CD_CANAL_DISTRIBUCION
FROM SAPHANADB.ZPRESUPUEST_RUTB A

JOIN SAPHANADB.ZSDCO_PARA_RUTA B
ON A.RUTA= B.BZIRK AND
A.VKORG=B.VKORG
WHERE A.MANDT = '400'
ORDER BY A.PERIODO

SELECT 
    C.CD_MONEDA_EXTRANJERA, 
	C.CD_MONEDA_LOCAL,
    B.CD_PERIODO,
	C.TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM 
  ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(LEFT(B.ANIO,4), RIGHT(B.MES,2)) as CD_PERIODO  from
SAPHANADB.ZCDS_COSTOS B where RIGHT(B.MES,2) < '13') B left join 
(
  SELECT   A.CD_MONEDA_EXTRANJERA, A.CD_MONEDA_LOCAL,  A.CD_PERIODO,
	LEAD(A.CD_PERIODO,1,'299901') over (ORDER BY A.CD_PERIODO) AS CD_PERIODO_FIN,
	A.TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM ( 
  SELECT 
	FCURR AS CD_MONEDA_EXTRANJERA,
	TCURR AS CD_MONEDA_LOCAL,
	LEFT(cast((99999999 - GDATU) as varchar(8)),6)  AS CD_PERIODO,
	AVG(UKURS) AS TASA_CAMBIARIA
FROM SAPHANADB.TCURR A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400'  AND FCURR = 'USD'
GROUP BY FCURR, TCURR, LEFT(cast((99999999 - GDATU) as varchar(8)),6) ) A ) C

on B.CD_PERIODO >= C.CD_PERIODO AND B.CD_PERIODO < C.CD_PERIODO_FIN
WHERE B.CD_PERIODO <= (SELECT MAX(LEFT(cast((99999999 - GDATU) as varchar(8)),6) ) from SAPHANADB.TCURR A
WHERE A.MANDT= '400'  AND FCURR = 'USD')  
order by B.CD_PERIODO
